author: The State of Delaware
title: Referendum - Department of Elections - State of Delaware
text: School Referendum Smyrna School District June 6, 2024 Polls open from 7 a.m. to 8 p.m. Election Information 2024 Referendum Calendar |Date||Event| |May 31, 2024||Last day the Department is permitted to mail absentee ballots for the Smyrna School District referendum| |June 5, 2024 at 12 Noon||Last time the Department is permitted to issue absentee ballots for the Smyrna School District referendum| |June 6, 2024||Smyrna School Referendum. Polls are open from 7 a.m. until 8 p.m.| |June 6, 2024 at 8 p.m.||Deadline to return voted absentee ballots to the Department's Kent County Office in order for them to be counted.| |June 10, 2024 at 10 a.m.||Certification of the referendum at the Department's Kent County Office.| |June 12, 2024 at 10 a.m.||Audit of the ballots cast on one randomly selected voting machine used in the Referendum.| |June 12, 2024 at 11 a.m.||Audit of the ballots cast at one randomly selected polling place used in the Referendum.| Polling PlacesPolls open from 7 a.m. to 8 p.m. You must provide proof of identity and address. This includes: - Delaware driver's license - Delaware ID card - Work ID card with photo and home address - U. S. postal material with street address |Building Name||Address| |Smyrna Elementary School||121 South School Lane, Smyrna| |Kenton Ruritan Club||249 South Main Street, Kenton| |Smyrna Middle School||700 Duck Creek Parkway, Smyrna| Results [Official Results](/school/smyrna/referenda/2024/20240606_SmyrnaReferendumOfficialResults.pdf)
